articles.title: Microsoft wants to make Windows an AI operating system, launches Copilot+ PCs - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft unveiled a new lineup of Windows machines it's calling Copilot+ PCs, plus generative AI-powered features. And new Microsoft Surface devices are on the way.
articles.content:
Microsoft wants to bring generative AI to the forefront of Windows and the PCs running it.
